metadata.title: Associate Tutorials
metadata.description: Study for the Terraform Associate exam by following these tutorials. Login to Learn and bookmark them to track your progress. Study the complete list of study materials (including docs) in the Certification Prep guides.

collection.name: Associate Tutorial List
collection.description: Study for the Terraform Associate exam by following these tutorials. Login to Learn and bookmark them to track your progress. Study the complete list of study materials (including docs) in the Certification Prep guides.

tutorials.name: What is Infrastructure as Code with Terraform?
tutorials.description: Learn how infrastructure as code lets you safely build, change, and manage infrastructure. Try Terraform.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Lock and upgrade provider versions
tutorials.description: Manage your provider versions using the dependency lock file. Use version constraints to filter provider versions compatible with your configuration. Update your lock file to use a new provider version.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Build infrastructure
tutorials.description: Authenticate to AWS and create an EC2 instance under the AWS free tier. Write and validate Terraform configuration, initialize a configuration directory, and plan and apply a configuration to create infrastructure.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Change infrastructure
tutorials.description: Modify EC2-instance configuration to use a different Ubuntu version. Plan and apply the changes to re-provision a new instance that reflects the new configuration. Learn how Terraform handles infrastructure change management.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Destroy infrastructure
tutorials.description: Destroy the AWS EC2 instance you created in the previous tutorials. Evaluate the plan and confirm the destruction.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Store remote state
tutorials.description: Configure Terraform to store state in HCP Terraform. Add a remote state block directly to configuration or set an environment variable to load remote state configuration when Terraform initializes.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Initialize Terraform configuration
tutorials.description: Learn what Terraform does when you run `terraform init` in a working directory. Initialize the backend, install providers, download modules, and explore the lock file and .terraform directory.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create a Terraform plan
tutorials.description: Learn how Terraform constructs an execution plan. Export a plan with the -out flag, review the plan contents, and apply a saved plan.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Apply Terraform configuration
tutorials.description: Learn how Terraform applies configuration to change your infrastructure. Provision a Docker container, introduce an apply error, note how Terraform handles errors, and perform basic troubleshooting.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Manage Terraform versions
tutorials.description: Update an existing configuration to work with a newer version of Terraform. Use the required_version setting to pin the Terraform versions for your projects. Manage different versions of Terraform across your team.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Customize Terraform configuration with variables
tutorials.description: Customize infrastructure for a web application with Terraform. In this tutorial, you will use Terraform input variables, including lists, maps, strings, and booleans, to make the configuration for your infrastructure more flexible.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Protect sensitive input variables
tutorials.description: Protect sensitive values from accidental exposure using Terraform sensitive input variables. Provision a web application with Terraform, and mark input variables as sensitive to restrict when Terraform prints them out to the console.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Output data from Terraform
tutorials.description: Use output values to export data about the resources Terraform manages.  Hide sensitive output values.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Query data sources
tutorials.description: Use a data source to configure an EC2 instance with an appropriate AMI for the current region. Use a remote state data source to share data between Terraform projects and to support multiple availability zones.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create resource dependencies
tutorials.description: Create an implicit dependency between an EC2 instance and its Elastic IP using variable interpolation. Create explicit dependencies on an S3 Bucket and SQS Queue with depends_on. Learn how Terraform creates independent resources in parallel.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Perform dynamic operations with functions
tutorials.description: Use templatefile and lookup functions to generate dynamic user data for an EC2 instance and find a region-specific AMI.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create dynamic expressions
tutorials.description: Make your Terraform configurations more dynamic and reusable with expressions. Use locals to assign expressions to variables for reuse, conditionals to declare if/then scenarios, and the splat expression to return attributes from complex value types.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Modules overview
tutorials.description: Read about how Terraform modules make configuration easier to organize, understand, reuse, and share. Learn about the directory structure of a module, and how to call them.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Use registry modules in configuration
tutorials.description: Use modules from the public Terraform Registry to define an Amazon VPC containing two EC2 instances. Select module and root input and output variables, install the modules, and apply the configuration.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Build and use a local module
tutorials.description: Write a local module to create an Amazon S3 bucket hosting a static website. Create a module directory, write the module configuration, variables, and outputs, and call the module from a root configuration.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Refactor monolithic Terraform configuration
tutorials.description: Deploy development and production versions of an S3-hosted static website. Separate their configuration into files, directories, and workspaces, and explore the architectural trade-offs of each approach.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Module creation - recommended pattern
tutorials.description: Learn the architectural recommendations for module creation distilled from engagements with large enterprises using Terraform. Use Terraform module best practices to scope, build, improve and consume Terraform modules.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Manage resources in Terraform state
tutorials.description: Create an EC2 instance and security group, and move a resource to another state file. Remove, replace, and re-import resources to manage state and reconcile drift in your infrastructure.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Target resources
tutorials.description: Apply changes to an AWS S3 bucket and bucket objects using resource targeting. Target individual resources, modules, and collections of resources to change or destroy. Explore how Terraform handles upstream and downstream dependencies.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Manage resource drift
tutorials.description: Create an AWS instance and security group. Manually change the instance to create drift in your Terraform state file. Reconcile your state drift and import your resources while avoiding downtime.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Use refresh-only mode to sync Terraform state
tutorials.description: Use refresh-only plans and applies to update Terraform state to match real-world infrastructure. Understand the implicit refresh behavior in Terraform plan and apply operations.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Troubleshoot Terraform
tutorials.description: Interpret and fix a Terraform configuration with common configuration language errors and deploy an EC2 instance with security groups in AWS. Learn best practices for logging application errors and reporting bugs.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Inject secrets into Terraform using the Vault provider
tutorials.description: Configure the AWS Secrets Engine to manage IAM credentials in Vault through Terraform. Then use the short-lived, Vault-generated, dynamic secrets to provision EC2 instances.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.name: Vault
product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

tutorials.name: Log in to HCP Terraform from the CLI
tutorials.description: Log into HCP Terraform or Enterprise with the Terraform CLI to migrate state, trigger remote runs, and interact with HCP Terraform.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Migrate state to HCP Terraform
tutorials.description: Migrate a state file to HCP Terraform for secure storage and easy collaboration.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: What is HCP Terraform - intro and sign up
tutorials.description: Sign up for HCP Terraform, which provides free remote state storage, a stable run environment, version control system (VCS) driven plans and applies, a collaborative web GUI, and more. Create your first organization.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create a credentials variable set
tutorials.description: Create a variable set for your AWS IAM credentials that you can reuse across workspaces. Apply the variable set to a workspace.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create a workspace
tutorials.description: Create a CLI-driven HCP Terraform workspace. Update configuration to enable integration with HCP Terraform.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Create infrastructure
tutorials.description: Set EC2 instance attributes using HCP Terraform workspace variables. Create the instance by planning and applying a run in HCP Terraform.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Change infrastructure
tutorials.description: Use command line input variables to modify infrastructure managed by HCP Terraform. Review workspace contents and interface.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Use VCS-driven workflow
tutorials.description: Update a workspace to use the version control system-driven workflow with GitHub. Queue a speculative plan by opening a pull request.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

tutorials.name: Destroy resources and workspaces
tutorials.description: Destroy the resources in an HCP Terraform workspace, and delete the workspace via the web UI.

product.name: Terraform
product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

alertBanner.text: Terraform Cloud is now HCP Terraform
